data.title: Airport Reina Sofia
data.meta_description: Airport Reina Sofia, airport of the city Santa Cruz De Tenerife
data.text:
General Information About the Airport Reina Sofia

The airport Reina Sofia is located near the city of Santa Cruz De Tenerife in Spain.

The international name of the airport Reina Sofia is Reina Sofia.

You can find the location of the airport Reina Sofia on maps using the geographic coordinates:

Latitude: 28.04, Longitude: -16.57.

You can get more information about the airport Reina Sofia on their website at http://www.aena.es

The runway elevation is 64 meters.

Individual Identifiers of the Airport Reina Sofia

The IATA code of the airport is TFS

The IATA code consists of 3 letters, developed by the International Air Transport Association, and is used by airlines and booking systems. You can enter the airport code in the search form for cheap airline tickets on the Aerotur.aero website.

The ICAO code of the airport is GCTS

The ICAO code consists of 4 letters:

The first letter represents the geographic region of the airport.

The second letter represents the country Spain.

The last letters represent the airport.

Nearest Airports to Reina Sofia

IATA code: GMZ, Airport: La Gomera, Distance: 63 km.

IATA code: TFN, Airport: Norte, Distance: 54 km.

Important Information for Departures from/Arrivals at the Airport Reina Sofia (Santa Cruz De Tenerife)

Please note that local time is always indicated in airline tickets. Local time in Santa Cruz De Tenerife (Santa Cruz de Tenerife) is +1 GMT.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about selecting, booking, or purchasing cheap airline tickets, please contact the support service at Aerotur.aero, or email us at help@aerotur.aero. For questions related to departures from/arrivals at the airport, you can write to our online chats on Telegram and WhatsApp.
